WebLink.url: window.open("https://calendly.com/{!Case.OwnerFirstName}_orderbird?sfid={!Case.Id}&name={!Contact.FirstName}%20{!Contact.LastName}&email={!Contact.Email}&a1={!URLENCODE(Contact.Phone)}&a2={!Account.CustomerID__c}%20{!URLENCODE(Account.Name)}", "_blank", "toolbar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, top=0, left=0, width=901, height=700");
